{{unreferenced|date=March 2013}} '''Kirillawala''' is a developing city in [[Sri Lanka]], 22 km from [[Colombo]] city centre on Colombo-Kandy [[A1 highway (Sri Lanka)|A1 motorway]]. An Iconic gigantic [[Buddha]] statue has been built at the nearby temple facing a junction known as the " Kandakapapu Handiya". Kirillawala-Colombo bus route number 138/1 operates from this junction. Landmarks and facilities include a traffic light system, a fuel station, well known Laknara Wedding and Conference Centre, Water Corridor Pvt Ltd (Strategic Investments & Leisure Destinations) Sathosa, [[People's Bank (Sri Lanka)|People's Bank]], HNB and Sampath bank ATM facilities etc.
